content: this pattern is available for free on my linked blog the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern in one printable file without advertisements worked in the round this throw pattern features dragonflies radiating out from the center of the blanket the pattern includes two different edge finishes one with a simple single_crochet border and colorful slip stitching to match the colors used in the blanket and the other a simple scallop i really like how they both look and hope you do too size approximately 40 x 40 easily adjusted my patterns are written in standard american terms and include pictures stitch guides and explanations as necessary to make them easy to follow please share your finished projects on our facebook page and join us for info coupon codes and giveaways text and images c the pattern paradise all rights reserved
